spell.name: Wild Strike
entries: The next time you hit a creature with a weapon attack during this spell's duration, your weapon seaps with potent poison, and the attack deals an extra {@damage 3d8} poison damage to the target. Additionally, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the spell ends.
A creature {@condition poisoned} by this spell makes another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. On a successful save, it is no longer {@condition poisoned}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 3rd.

spell.name: Tempest Spear
entries: As part of casting this spell, and as an Action on each of your turns for the duration (if you choose to concentrate on the spell), you throw a melee weapon you wield as though it had the "Thrown 60/180\" property. On a hit, the weapon deals an additional {@damage 1d6} Lightning damage.
For the duration, you can use your bonus action to recall the weapon to you (as long as it remains on the same plane of existence as you), causing it to teleport back to your hand(s).

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the additional lighting damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for  every slot above 2nd.

spell.name: Feral Form
entries: You transform to take on aspects of a feral bestial nature. Fur covers your body, you grow impressive musculature and size, your hands become claws, and your face becomes a bestial maw. Further, a primal rage overtakes you. For the duration:
You can make unarmed strike (claw) attacks which deal {@damage 2d4} slashing damage on a hit, instead of the normal damage for unarmed strikes. These attacks count as magical.

No more than once per turn, you can make an unarmed strike (bite) attack which deals {@damage 2d8} piercing damage on a hit, instead of the normal damage for unarmed strikes. These attacks count as magical.

Once per turn, when you reduce a creature to 0 hit points with a claw or bite attack with this spell, you can immediately move up to 15 feet without expending movement and make another claw or bite attack with this spell against a different creature.
Starting on your next turn, the spell ends early if your turn ends, and you have not attacked a hostile creature since your last turn or taken damage since then.

spell.name: Frozen Star
entries: You create an orb of frost that hovers at an unoccupied point you can see within range. The orb is a small object the occupies a 5-foot space. It has an AC of 12, 30 hit points, immunity to cold and psychic damage, resistance to non-magical damage, and vulnerability to fire damage.
The orb sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius, and dim light for an additional 20 feet.

Each creature, other than you, that starts it turn within 40 feet of the orb must make a Constitution saving throw, suffering {@damage 3d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A creature that fails its save and is within 20 feet of the orb becomes {@condition restrained}.

If you concentrate on the spell on the spell for the  full duration, when it ends, the orb explodes. The orb also explodes if it is destroyed. When the orb explodes, all creatures within 20 feet of it must make a Constitution saving throw, suffering {@damage 6d6} cold damage on a  failed save, or half as much on a successful one. A creature that fails its save is also {@condition petrified} in a thick layer of ice until its next turn ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage a creature takes at the start of its turn increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 4th, and the damage caused by the orb's explosion increases by {@dice 2d6} for each slot above 4th.

spell.name: Booming Blitz
entries: You launch yourself forward, surrounded by thunderous force, in a straight line up to 30 feet. This movement ends if it is blocked by a creature or secured object. All creatures, other than you, within 5 feet of the line you move through must make a Constitution saving throw, suffering {@damage 2d6} thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.
At the end of the movement, if you are adjacent to a creature, you may make a single melee weapon attack as part of the spell. If the attack hits, it deals an extra {@damage 1d6} thunder damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or greater, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Arcane Reflection

time.condition: which you take when you are hit by a spell attack or forced to make a saving throw against a spell that targets only you

entries: You conjure a magical mirror just before being struck by a spell. If the spell is a spell of 3rd level or lower, the spell has no effect on you and instead, the spell is cast at the original caster as part of this reaction. The spell uses your spellcasting ability modifier for its attack roll or your spell save DC. If the spell is of 4th level or higher, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability. The DC equal 10 + the spell's level. On a success, the spell is redirected back at the caster as described above.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the spell is reflected if it is a level less than the level of the spell slot used

spell.name: Resonant Shield
entries: You raise the shield used in the spell's casting and prepare yourself against attacks. While is spell is active, you gain the same benefits as if you used the Dodge action.

Moreover, the next creature that hits you with a melee attack while this spell is active must succeed on a Strength saving throw or take force damage equal to your spellcasting ability modifier, be pushed 5 feet from you, and be knocked {@condition prone}. The spell then ends.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: At 5th level, the force damage increases to {@dice 1d8} + your spellcasting modifier/ That damage roll increases again by {@dice 1d8} at 11th level ({@dice 2d8}) and once against at 17th level ({@dice 3d8})

spell.name: Quill's Arcane Riposte

time.condition: which you take when a creature misses you with a melee weapon attack

entries: When a large or smaller creature misses you with a melee weapon attack, you can magically deflect the attack back against that creature. Using your reaction, you catch your opponent's attack with your weapon in a magical parry that explosively reflects back the attacker's momentum in a blast of arcane energy.

The creature must make a Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@damage 4d12} force damage and is pushed back 15 feet, falling {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and is not pushed or knocked {@condition prone}.

components.m: one melee weapon which you are wielding

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d12} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Quill's Ghostly Blade
entries: The blade of a weapon you brandish transformers into a pale, ghostly light, allowing it to easily bypass your enemy's attacks made with that weapon.
Until the spell ends, you have advantage on melee attacks made with that weapon. The next time you hit with that weapon, it deals an extra {@damage 2d4} force damage and the spell ends/
The spell ends early if you are no longer holding the weapon used to cast the spell.

components.m: one melee weapon worth at least 10 gp

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: The extra force damage increases by {@dice 1d4} for each level above 2nd that you cast the spell.

spell.name: Quill's Zigzagging Lunge
entries: Choose up to 3 creatures that you can see within 60 feet of you. Each creature must be adjacent to an unoccupied space that you could occupy. You teleport between the chosen creatures in an order of your choosing, making a single melee weapon attack against each creature before teleporting to an unoccupied space within 15 feet of the last creature you attacked as part of this spell. A creature cannot be targeted with more than one attack using this spell.

components.m: one melee weapon that you use to make up to three attacks with as part of this spell

spell.name: Crystal Armour
entries: You create an armour of glistening crystals on your body. This armour increases your AC by 1 for the duration. If a creature hits you  with a melee attack while you have this armour, the creature takes {@damage 1d8} piercing damage, a creature can take this damage a maximum of once per turn.

components.m: a small crystal with a bit of holy text written on it

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the piercing damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot.

spell.name: Crystalline Rose
entries: You summon a crystal rose, in an unoccupied space that you can see within range. As part of casting this spell, and on subsequent turns as a bonus action, you can cause the rose to drain the life of surrounding creatures. Each creature in a 20-foot radius centred on the rose must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 2d65} necrotic damage.

When you stop concentrating on the spell, the rose explodes. Each creature in the radius must success on a Dexterity saving throw or take an amount of piercing damage equal to the total number of necrotic damage rose dealt (to a maximum of {@dice 10d6}), or half as much damage on a success.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 4th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for every two slot levels above 3rd.

spell.name: Oor's Hellfire Rebuttal

time.condition: which you take in response to being damaged by a creature within 30 feet of you that you can see

entries: Two fiery spirits emerge from your wounds, seeking revenge on the creature that damaged you.
Make a ranged spell attack for each spirit. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} fire damage.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you create one additional spirit for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Oor's Solar Flare Spear
entries: You concentrate the power of the sun, moulding it into a spear, and hurl it towards a creature you can see within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the creature. On a hit, it takes {@damage 4d10} fire damage and {@damage 4d10} radiant damage.

spell.name: Oor's Guiding Flame
entries: You point towards a creature you can see within range, causing a radiant fire to erupt at the creature's location.

The creature must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes {@damage 3d8} fire damage on a failed save, and the next attack roll against this target before the end of your next turn has advantage and deals an additional {@damage 2d8} radiant damage.
On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and suffers no additional effects.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, the damage increases by {@damage 1d8} fire damage and {@damage 1d8} radiant damage for each slot level above 2nd.

spell.name: Polar Ray
entries: You glaciate a mass of ice crystals around yourself and launch a beam of boreal air at an enemy or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 1d6} cold damage plus an amount equal to your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell will instantly extinguish a campfire or freeze a gallon of water.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: This spell's damage increases by an amount equal to your spellcasting ability modifier at 5th level ({@dice 1d6} plus two times your modifier), 11th level ({@dice 1d6} plus three times your modifier), and 17th level ({@dice 1d6} plus four times your modifier).

spell.name: Alina's Captivating Assistants
entries: You create up to 4 illusionary images of yourself within the radius. You can decide the accessories of the images such as hairstyle, clothing, and jewellery, but they must still be easily identifiable as you. A creature can make an intelligence check against your spell save DC to identify which of the images is you. On a failure, the creature cannot tell the difference.

Each of these images is proficient in 1 instrument of your choosing. The images have the instrument they are proficient with in their hands when you create them.  You can command the illusions to perform and to stop performing as a bonus action. When the images play their instrument, it is indistinguishable from any real instrument. The images cannot leave the radius and will move with you at will.
While this spell is active, you gain advantage on all performance checks while your images are performing.
